text: Great outdoor venue! Went when there was a live band (who actually were kind enough to let me sing with them) and it was a really fun time. Beautifully built outdoor bar with swings for seats. The owners are friendly and very welcoming. Felt more like we were at a friend's party in their backyard than at a bar! Good beer selection, large apps menu, and good burgers! Wonderful experience all over and I highly recommend going!
I've heard this place has really good fried chicken. I guess it's time to go investigate
Everyone is very friendly. Food is amazing alot of different things to choose from. Food is not overpriced has family seating, as well as bar seating. Has a beer garden out back as well.
